quest.name: In Search of Raubahn
journal: Higiri is eager to assist you.

Higiri informs you that the 3rd Unit Braves, led by Yuyuhase, have recently left the Rising Stones. Their purpose: to escort Raubahn to his execution. Make your way to Highbridge and seek out Doware, who will apprise you of the unit's movements.
According to Doware, Yuyuhase and the 3rd are bound for Halatali. Make your way to the training grounds in eastern Thanalan, and join Hozan at the entrance.
Hozan informs you that Ilberd was seen entering Halatali mere moments before your arrivalâ”€proof positive that Raubahn is being held within.

dialogue.name: HIGIRI
dialogue.text: Shortly before you arrived, I received word from Limsa Lominsa that you were searching for General Raubahn.

dialogue.name: HIGIRI
dialogue.text: As the Admiral will have informed you, he was recently moved from his cell in the Marasaja Pit.

dialogue.name: HIGIRI
dialogue.text: At the same juncture, Yuyuhase and the 3rd Unit were observed leaving the Rising Stones.

dialogue.name: HIGIRI
dialogue.text: This can be no simple coincidence. Their purpose, we believe, is to escort the Flame General to the scene of his execution.

dialogue.name: HIGIRI
dialogue.text: Suffice it to say, we have people shadowing the 3rd. If you would join the hunt, pray seek out Doware at Highbridge, where I too am bound.

dialogue.name: HIGIRI
dialogue.text: My comrades pursue the 3rd Unit Braves, even as we speak. If you would join the hunt, pray seek out Doware at Highbridge, where I too am bound.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Yet again, our Doman friends prove their worth... Lolorito was a fool to refuse them asylum.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Could she be the Doman contact of whom the Admiral spoke?

dialogue.name: DOUWARE
dialogue.text: I have been expecting you. Time is of the essence, so I shall be direct.

dialogue.name: DOUWARE
dialogue.text: Yuyuhase and his men are bound for Halatali.

dialogue.name: DOUWARE
dialogue.text: We believe that this is where they intend to carry out the execution.

dialogue.name: DOUWARE
dialogue.text: Hozan is presently keeping watch over the entrance. Let us make haste and join him.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Yuyuhase... The mere mention of the name calls to mind the moment I felt the kiss of cold steel against my neck...

dialogue.name: HIGIRI
dialogue.text: It has been a while since last I wore this garb. Since I came to Revenant's Toll, my days have been spent in kitchens. Fear not, however: though I have learned to wield a skillet, I have not forgotten the use of a dagger.

dialogue.name: HOUZAN
dialogue.text: You come at a good time, my friends. But moments ago, the traitor Ilberd arrived and entered Halatali.

dialogue.name: HOUZAN
dialogue.text: From this, we may be certain that General Raubahn is being held within.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Raubahn's ties to Halatali are well known. That Ilberd should choose this of all places to stage his execution is no coincidence. The fiend... Are there no depths to which he will not stoop?
